metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4574 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the append_utf8_value function in the DN decoder (dn.c) in Libksba before 1.3.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via invalid utf-8 encoded data. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-4356.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libksba8 - 1.3.3-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libksba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-1ubuntu0.16.04.1').
